com.pcloud.networking.client

Class Endpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.networking.client.Endpoint

  • public final class Endpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation to wrap the details of an endpoint - a host address, a port and a SocketAddress.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Endpoint DEFAULT
      The default Endpoint for the binApi client.

        public Endpoint(java.lang.String host,
                int port)
        Creates the Endpoint instance.
        Parameters:
        host - The host URL
        port - The port on which we will connect
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on a null host parameter and on a port less than 0 or greater than 65535
